title: Backend Developer
description: The Rule Enforcement team is dedicated to keeping all employees in line. &nbsp;Rule enforcers use&nbsp;various tactics such as physical intimidation, awkward pauses, and dramatic coffee sips in order to make sure everyone does what they're told.
